app.title: KotCat
app.tagline: KotCat Effective flashcard learning system. Remember information faster and longer.

firstScreen.tag: A new approach to language learning
firstScreen.title: Memorize words in context, not by lists
firstScreen.description: Language learning cards that help you understand, not just memorize. Create examples with AI, save words directly from your browser, and learn them at your own pace.

hero.title: Start memorizing words consciously
hero.description: Add words from real content, learn them in context, and return to them when it's really necessary.

context.title: why context is more important than memorization
context.description: We have created a service where you learn words as they are used in real life: in sentences, situations, and live context. This reduces the load on memory and makes learning natural.

contextAI.title: Context + AI
contextAI.subtitle: Learn words in sentences — automatically
contextAI.item2: See the word in different contexts
contextAI.item3: Better understand nuances of meaning and usage
contextAI.accent: A card is not just a translation, but a complete semantic block.

chrome.title: Chrome Extension
chrome.subtitle: Add words directly from websites
chrome.description: Reading articles, documentation, or news? With the Chrome extension you can:
chrome.item1: Highlight a word or phrase on the page
chrome.item2: Add it to your dictionary in one click
chrome.accent: No copying to notes and "for later".

importExport.title: Import / Export
importExport.subtitle: Full control over your dictionary
importExport.description: You are not tied to the platform.
importExport.item3: Convenient to work with large lists
importExport.accent: Suitable for both personal learning and systematic work with a dictionary.

adaptive.title: Adaptability
adaptive.subtitle: Convenient on any screen
adaptive.accent: The interface is simple, light, and uncluttered — nothing distracts from learning.
